flavorText: Each new generation of slivers evolves to assimilate the strengths of the prey upon which their progenitors fed.

foreignData.flavorText: Jede neue Remasurigeneration entwickelt sich weiter, um sich die Eigenschaften der Beute, von der sich ihre Erzeuger ernährt haben, anzueignen.
foreignData.name: Spinndrüsenremasuri

foreignData.flavorText: Cada nueva generación de fragmentados evoluciona asimilando las fortalezas de las presas que alimentaban a sus progenitores.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado hilandero
foreignData.text: Todas las criaturas Fragmentado tienen la habilidad de alcance.

foreignData.flavorText: Chaque nouvelle génération de slivoïdes évolue pour assimiler les forces des proies dont se nourrissaient leurs progéniteurs.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde à filière
foreignData.text: Toutes les créatures Slivoïde ont la portée.

foreignData.flavorText: Ogni nuova generazione di tramutanti si evolve per assimilare i punti di forza delle prede di cui si sono nutriti i loro progenitori.
foreignData.name: Tramutante Filiera
foreignData.text: Tutte le creature Tramutante hanno raggiungere.

foreignData.flavorText: 新世代のスリヴァーは、自分の祖先が食べた餌食の長所を吸収し進化する。
foreignData.name: 紡績スリヴァー
foreignData.text: すべてのスリヴァー・クリーチャーは到達を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

foreignData.flavorText: Cada nova geração dos fractius evolui para assimilar a força das presas que alimentaram seus antepassados.
foreignData.name: Fractius de Fiandeira
foreignData.text: Todas as criaturas do tipo Fractius têm alcance.

foreignData.flavorText: Каждое следующее поколение щепок развивалось и поглощало силы добычи, которую поедали их родители.
foreignData.name: Прядильная Щепка

foreignData.flavorText: 裂片妖能吸收所捕食的猎物长处，演化出新一代品种。
foreignData.name: 丝疣裂片妖
foreignData.text: 所有裂片妖生物具有延势异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 裂片妖能吸收所捕食的獵物長處，演化出新一代品種。
foreignData.name: 絲疣裂片妖
foreignData.text: 所有裂片妖生物具有延勢異能。

name: Spinneret Sliver

rulings.text: Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.
If the creature type of a Sliver changes so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures.
